languages.text: {n}Маражая перекашивает от бешенства — которое, однако, он не решается излить на Арлекина здесь и сейчас. Сквозь сцепленные зубы друкари шипит:{/n} "Все, кто повинен в моем падении, будут истреблены..."
{n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражая перекашивает от бешенства — которое, однако, он не решается излить на Арлекина здесь и сейчас. Сквозь сцепленные зубы друкари шипит:{/n} "Все, кто повинен в моем падении, будут истреблены..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage which he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth:{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be destroyed..."

{n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはハーレクインへの怒りに身をよじっている。 今ここでそれを表に出す勇気がないのだ。彼は歯を食いしばってシューシューという音を立てた。{/n}「私の失脚に加担した者はすべて抹殺してやる…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはハーレクインへの怒りに身をよじっている。 今ここでそれを表に出す勇気がないのだ。彼は歯を食いしばってシューシューという音を立てた。{/n}「私の失脚に加担した者はすべて抹殺してやる…」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋气得浑身发抖，但却不敢将怒火发泄在眼前的丑角身上。他咬紧牙关，发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“所有密谋对付我的人，都会死在我的手上……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋气得浑身发抖，但却不敢将怒火发泄在眼前的丑角身上。他咬紧牙关，发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“所有密谋对付我的人，都会死在我的手上……”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se retuerce con una rabia que no se atreve a desatar sobre el Arlequín aquí y ahora. Sisea entre dientes apretados:{/n} «Todos los que han participado en mi caída serán exterminados...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se retuerce con una rabia que no se atreve a desatar sobre el Arlequín aquí y ahora. Sisea entre dientes apretados:{/n} «Todos los que han participado en mi caída serán exterminados...».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai bebt vor Wurt, die er nicht hier und jetzt gegen den Harlekin entfesseln will. Er stößt durch zusammengepresste Zähne hervor:{/n} "Alle, die an meinem Sturz beteiligt waren, werden ausgelöscht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bebt vor Wurt, die er nicht hier und jetzt gegen den Harlekin entfesseln will. Er stößt durch zusammengepresste Zähne hervor:{/n} "Alle, die an meinem Sturz beteiligt waren, werden ausgelöscht ..."

languages.text: {n}Tremblant de rage, Marazhai n'ose pourtant pas s'opposer à l'Arlequin. Il peine à desserrer suffisamment les dents pour rétorquer :{/n} « Tous ceux qui ont pris part à ma chute seront exterminés... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tremblant de rage, Marazhai n'ose pourtant pas s'opposer à l'arlequin. Il peine à desserrer suffisamment les dents pour rétorquer :{/n} « Tous ceux qui ont pris part à ma chute seront exterminés... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, mevcut durumda Arleken'den çıkarmaya cüret edemeyeceği bir öfkeyle kıvranıp duruyor. Sıktığı dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Çöküşümde parmağı olan herkesin sonu gelecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is squirming with rage he does not dare to unleash on the Harlequin here and now. He hisses through clenched teeth,{/n} "All who have taken part in my downfall will be exterminated..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, mevcut durumda Arleken'den çıkarmaya cüret edemeyeceği bir öfkeyle kıvranıp duruyor. Sıktığı dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Çöküşümde parmağı olan herkesin sonu gelecek."
